entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 34. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 32.
